goal.title: Software Designer & Developer
goal.subtitle: with a quality background
goal.purposeText: My purpose is to build software that helps companies automate their processes and better monitor their operations in a continuous improvement system ‚úîÔ∏è.
goal.subtitle1Text: It is important for companies to be proactive in this fast modern world üåç. Monitoring processes and indicators using software can help the team catch issues before they happen. While working as a quality manager, I was able to save money and time üïñ by monitoring daily operations. That's why as a software developer I am trying to create simple and efficient dashboards that provide meaningful insights.
goal.subtitle2Text: It happens frequently that teams are under pressure with an important amount of workload üóÉÔ∏è. Software can automate repetitive tasks in order to save time, improve efficiency and free up time for more complex tasks. üîé I like to audit processes and integrate productivity tools to help teams in their daily tasks.
goal.subtitle3Text: The implementation of quality processes helps prevent problems, or ensure that they will not recur, using preventive actions, root cause analysis and collaborative participation ü§ù. A big part of continuous improvement also comes with CI / CD, agile principle, software tests and sharing knowledge within the company.
goal.projectsList: Check some of my projects out!

about.title1Text:
Throughout my career as a quality manager for food companies, I have often wanted to be able to code tools that would allow me to automate and do better monitoring. Back from my four-year stay in the United States, I decided to take the plunge and obtain a computer science degree.

Today I am happy to be able to make the link between my knowledge in quality management and the one in software development. I am currently creating simple and efficient software to help teams in their daily tasks and accompany them to take decisions.
about.title2: My double experience as a Quality Manager & a Software Developer

dawan.title: Software Developer
dawan.tasks1: Built a planning application, for a training center, to help both the Sales and the HR team to keep track of trainers‚Äô schedules and the list of courses sold (Java / Vue.js)

dawan.tasks4: Developed a web scraping program with Selenium to help a company to analyze the market (Java / Angular)

cuisine.title: Quality Manager
cuisine.tasks1: Ensured BRC level AA, Organic, ABF, Halal and Gluten-Free certifications, FDA / USDA inspections and customer audits for the plant in Alexandria (Virginia). Traveled also to different factories (the United States and Thailand) to provide technical assistance to help them to prepare their audits
cuisine.tasks2: Managed a quality team with 13 persons (2 managers, 3 supervisors, and 8 technicians)
cuisine.tasks3: Worked with the R&D team to develop new products (from supplier approval to packaging creation)
cuisine.tasks4: Reported the performance of the quality system to senior management during quarterly reviews

florette.title: Quality Assistant Manager
florette.tasks1: Performed internal audits, prepared and participated in external audits (customer audits and IFS/BRC audit)
florette.tasks2: Trained and monitored 11 new quality controllers, managed their schedule, and followed up their projects
florette.tasks3: Collected data, followed and presented KPIs to the Management Team

neuhauser.title: Quality Assistant Manager
neuhauser.tasks1: Managed internal non-conformities and complaints to suppliers
neuhauser.tasks2: Monitored and managed customer satisfaction: customer complaints, specifications, create and update final specifications
neuhauser.tasks3: Helped to create new products (production and quality records to create, final specification and packaging)

quality.title: Personal Project - Quality management system design
quality.subtitle1Text: How to help quality teams with their daily tasks while preparing for audits during the year ?
quality.subtitle3Monitoring: Monitoring : create a dashboard for QA team, notify managers immediately when there is a quality issue, create different pages to manage suppliers, food fraud, trainings, etc.
quality.subtitle3Automate: Automate : automate with workflows using internal softwares, external applications (Teams, Outlook, etc) and suppliers' API
quality.supplierFile: Save files from suppliers in their folders
quality.notification: Notify QA team to review new documents
quality.subtitle3Decision: Continuous improvement : alert when Non-Conformities are not closed or when there is a recurrence with a Non-Conformity, follow audits if they are shceduled or not, watch customer complaints

planning-web.title: Company Project - Planning Application (Java / Vue.js)
planning-web.issueText: The company decided to stop using a spreadsheet and create a web application their planning management tool. This improvement was motivated by the fact that the spreadsheet was not easy for the company to keep track of modification and they could not improve it with new needs.
planning-web.solutionText: The company wanted to create a web application to have a tool easier to use, more readable and synchronizable while multiple users were using it. The specifications given were : using color coding to see at a glance in which city trainings would be taken place, having a planning for each category of employees, being able to visualize the planning all over the year, implementing filters by user and by training.
planning-web.subtitle1Text2: Wrote functional and technical specifications file (eg: Use cases view, Logical (functional) view, Realization view, Deployment view, ...)
planning-web.subtitle2Text1: The wireframing tool, Uxpin, was used to create the mock-up
planning-web.subtitle2Text2: The sequence of website' screens was done using draw.io
planning-web.subtitle2Text3: Accessibility and security were taken into consideration while doing the design
planning-web.subtitle2Text4: The Kanban task board from Notion was used to manage users stories
planning-web.subtitle4Text1: Structural tests : Jest & JUnit 5 (Jacoco for code coverage)
planning-web.subtitle4Text4: Security testing : OWASP Guide & OWASP ZAP
planning-web.subtitle4Text6: User testing : Quiz for Admin & Non-Admin
planning-web.subtitle5Text2: Deployed in production with Harbore & Rundeck
planning-web.positive: üòÄ What I enjoyed with this project
planning-web.positivetext1: Created the web application from scratch
planning-web.positivetext2: Learn new technologies and tools (WebSocket, Vuex store, Vue i18n , etc.)
planning-web.improvement: ü§î What I would like to do better next time
planning-web.improvementText1: Better respect the TDD method throughout the project

planning-android.title: Company Project - Android planning application (Java)
planning-android.issueText: Non-admin employees didn't have access easily to their planning to know when they have to teach.
planning-android.solutionText: Creation of a mobile application to know the list of the connected employee's trainings during the year, see details of his trainings and possibility to synchronize a training with his calendar.
planning-android.subtitle1Text2: Wrote functional and technical specifications file (eg: Use cases view, Logical (functional) view, Realization view, Deployment view, ...)
planning-android.subtitle2Text1: The wireframing tool, Figma, was used to create the mock-up
planning-android.subtitle2Text2: Accessibility and security were taken into consideration while doing the design
planning-android.subtitle2Text3: The Kanban task board from Notion was used to manage users stories
planning-android.subtitle4Text1: Structural tests : JUnit 5 (Jacoco for code coverage)
planning-android.subtitle4Text3: Security testing : OWASP Guide & OWASP ZAP
planning-android.subtitle4Text5: User testing : Quiz for Admin & Non-Admin
planning-android.subtitle5Text2: Created a link to download the APK
planning-android.positive: üòÄ What I enjoyed with this project
planning-android.positivetext1: Created an Android application from scratch
